explains: adj. 有争议的，引发争论的

sentences.en: Immigration is a controversial issue in many countries.
sentences.cn: 移民在很多国家都是一个有争议的问题。

sentences.en: The distinction between craft and fine art is more controversial.
sentences.cn: 工艺和美术之间的区别更有争议。

sentences.en: Winston Churchill and Richard Nixon were both controversial figures.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿•邱吉尔和理查德•尼克松都是有争议的人物。
